lead_paragraph: With recovery fragile elsewhere, Latin America benefits from strong commodity demand and past economic measures.
snippet: With recovery fragile elsewhere, Latin America benefits from strong commodity demand and past economic measures.

headline.print_headline: Latin Economies Racing Forward As Others Creep
headline.main: Economies in Latin America Race Ahead
headline.sub: Rising Trade With Asia and Policy Decisions Spur Growth;

byline.contributor: Andrea Zárate contributed reporting from Lima.
